userStories.title: Implement Basic Arithmetic Operations
userStories.description: As a developer, I need basic arithmetic operations (addition and multiplication) so that I can perform fundamental calculations in the application.
acceptanceCriteria: Addition function accepts two numbers and returns their sum
Multiplication function accepts two numbers and returns their product
Functions handle both integer and floating-point numbers
Functions are properly documented with docstrings
Unit tests are written and passing

userStories.title: Implement Trigonometric Functions
userStories.description: As a developer, I need trigonometric functions (sine and cosine) so that I can perform angle-based calculations for the product features.
acceptanceCriteria: Sin function calculates sine of angle in degrees
Cos function calculates cosine of angle in degrees
Functions return accurate values (tested against known values)
Functions are properly documented with examples
Unit tests cover common angles (0, 30, 45, 60, 90, 180 degrees)

userStories.title: Implement Geometry Calculations
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to calculate the distance between two points so that I can implement location-based features in the application.
acceptanceCriteria: Distance function accepts coordinates of two points (x1, y1, x2, y2)
Function calculates Euclidean distance correctly
Function handles edge cases (same point, origin, negative coordinates)
Function is properly documented with examples
Unit tests verify accuracy with known distances

userStories.title: Setup Git Repository and Workflow
userStories.description: As a team lead, I need to setup Git repository in Azure DevOps so that the distributed team can collaborate effectively on code development.
acceptanceCriteria: Git repository is created in Azure DevOps
Initial project structure is committed
README and documentation are in place
Branch protection rules are configured
All team members have access

userStories.title: Code Review and Documentation
userStories.description: As a team member, I need comprehensive code documentation and review process so that code quality is maintained and knowledge is shared across the team.
acceptanceCriteria: All functions have detailed docstrings
README documentation is complete
Code review process is established
Git commit history is clean and meaningful
Pull request workflow is documented
